body.p: This letter will reach you, accompanied by a petition in behalf of Jas. L. Marshall.

I know nothing of the facts of the case, but I know many of the names to the petition, and I have no hesitation in saying to you, that the prayer of the petition should be granted, if consistent with your official duties. The petition is signed by some of the most highly respectable citizens of our county --

Wishing you all the
happiness & prospeity that could happen mortality --

I am Yours Truly
Geo. W. Heite
